summary: 4 different sets of the unarmed kill animations each including the original two (slam, combo) unarmed kill animations plus four others based on the 1 and 2 handed kill animations
descriptionHtml:
4 different sets of the unarmed kill animations each including the original two (slam, combo) unarmed kill animations plus four others based on the 1 and 2 handed kill animations. This includes the following:
1. Decapitation only
2. Non-Decapitation 1
3. Non-Decapitation 2
4. Non-Decapitation 3

Basically, for this mod I looked at all the 1 and 2 handed animations and determined which ones looked reasonable for unarmed. Look through each set and tell me if there are certain animations that are good or bad or if I missed out a good one or if you want me to create like a best of set. 

I would like to thank xXSuiciderXx for first creating the unarmed mod as I was able to look at his mod and work out how he was able to add the 1 handed kill animations for use in unarmed. It also differs from his mod as the frequency of some of the kill animations was unbalanced and I was able to fix that.

I have uploaded all the Non-decapitation and Decapitation sets on youtube playlist for view:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLF6A46F7B8D9B5CA5&feature=view_all

I have also included all the kill animations I thought about using (Maybe Set) and those of which I didn\'t use at all because they were more out of place than the others (Not used Set). 

Installation
Extract file and insert .esp file into the Data folder of the Skyrim directory.

[youtube]heZQqbv23Hk[/youtube]
Skyrim Mod Unarmed Kill Animations - Decapitation Set


[youtube]u5ghudfMTnY[/youtube]
Skyrim Mod Unarmed Kill Animations - Non-Decapitation Set 1
author: sulezraz
